revised_title: Investigation of the Interaction Between Hydrogen Chloride and Chlorate in the Presence of Potassium Iodide
tldr: The authors investigate the interaction between hydrogen chloride and chlorate in the presence of potassium iodide, discovering that the reaction proceeds at a uniform rate when an iodide is present. They also find that sunlight has no effect on the rate of change in the presence of an iodide, but in the absence of an iodide, the oxidizing substance accumulates and its further production is impeded.
